description:
Alien warmonger Red Falcon is back! Thought to have been defeated by the heroic warriors Mad Dog and Scorpion, he’s assembled a force of evil minions to attack Earth.

Based on the hit arcade game, Super C is the sequel to the classic Contra™. Battle through intense side-scrolling and top-down viewpoint shooter action, and save the planet.

Take on Red Falcon yourself or team up with a friend via Download Play (two Nintendo 3DS™ systems and at least one copy of the game are required).
name: Super C
